description: Hybrid branch integrating GQFT (A) and Emergent Gravity (B); quantum gauge foundation with thermodynamic emergence overlay. Focuses on entropy-gauge duality, hybrid GW/DM predictions, and joint LISA/galactic tests.

manifold.formula: M (Riemannian with Fisher metric g_ij = E[∂_i log p · ∂_j log p])
manifold.notes: Belief space; integrates hybrid compactness via gauge-entropic flows.

path_integral.name: Z
path_integral.notes: Unifier; hybrid emergence via stationary phase and entropic averages.

action.notes: GSM with thermodynamic entropy; blends gauge and emergent terms.

free_energy.notes: Bridges hybrid via entropy in gauge fields.

integrated_equation.formula: dξ/dt = -∇_g F - λ_eff ∇_g ρ + ∇ · J_S + κ Φ(ρ)
integrated_equation.notes: Dynamics over hybrid substrate; conatus from gauge-entropic symmetries.

physics_substrate.hybrid: GQFT spin/scaling gauge with Kastner-Schlatter thermodynamic emergence; renormalizable at micro; entropic DM/GR at macro; predicts 6 GW modes with entropic damping.
physics_substrate.unifier: Z with GSM + thermo; bounds gaps <1%.

steel_man_certificate.residual: LISA/CMB hybrid tests pending (0.4%); deeper unification (0.3%).

gw_modes.path: Yields 6 polarizations with thermodynamic damping; SymPy verified.

galactic_rotation.path: Derives flat curves from hybrid forces; SymPy verified.

phases.phase_1: Hybrid module integration; joint prediction pipeline.
phases.phase_3: Cross-validation with A/B; experimental falsification setup.
